attributes.action: dredge the rivers to prevent flooding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This recent spate of flooding should force the powers that be to cast their minds back to the good old days when rivers were dredged and flooding of the scale recently experienced by far too many people in Britain was never heard of. And as dredgers are currently in use in the Channel there should be nothing to stop British shipbuilders from being given contracts to increase the fleet and sort the problem of flooding once and for all!
